about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Know more <1/><2>about me</2>
about.content:
I am a programmer who is passionate about creating websites on the <1>Front-end side and also has solid knowledge in the <2>Back-end side. I am a self-taught developper who is constantly learning about new technologies and that loves <3>designing and sketching interfaces.

I enjoy taking on new challenges that put my capabilities into practice, allowing me to learn new skills.

experiences.title: Fullstack Odoo Developer
experiences.subtitle: Toh Soluciones Digitales
experiences.description: Odoo developer specialized on creating custom system for companies that use (or want to use) Odoo as their ERP solution. Experienced in Odoo module development using Python, JavaScript, Bootstrap CSS and XML/HTML for designing business logic, API integrations and building or redesigning landing pages and the Odoo graphic interface.

experiences.title: Computer Science Engineering
experiences.subtitle: TECNM Campus Motul
experiences.description: Graduated and titled as Computer Science Engineer. In my journey as a student I was part of relevant projects for the university such as LaGranjita Point of Sale, where I put into practice the web programming. I did my internship in the company Toh Soluciones Dgitales under the project "Project Management Dashboard" where after finishing, they hired me.

footballClub.title: Football Club Landing Page
footballClub.description: A template to organice the information about your football club where you can show the incoming matches, table positions, squad, etc.

quickNotes.title: Quick Notes (To-Do list)
quickNotes.description: A simple to-do list website built using the MERN stack with MySQL. It allows users to create, update and delete tasks or notes and set them as done anytime.
